title: Question 2:
description: How can I check how much sUSD burning is required to unlock a certain amount of SNX?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value: If you try to send more SNX than is transferrable the transaction will fail. There are two ways you can check how many SNX are unlocked:

fields.title: Staking dapp
fields.value: In the [Staking dapp](https://staking.synthetix.io/) if you go to the burn custom page and enter various burn figures, it will show you transferable SNX incorporating c-ratio and the escrowed SNX factors. To unstake/unlock SNX beyond what is already transferable, you must burn some sUSD.

fields.title: Codepen
fields.value: A Synthetix core contributor created a tool for stakers to check. Go to [codepen](https://codepen.io/justinjmoses/pen/qwqoBR) and enter your wallet address, and you'll be told how many unlocked SNX you have.
